TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi sealed beforefieldinit Colors extends System.Object

summary.span: 實作一組預先定義的顏色。

span.span: Implements a set of predefined colors.

remarks.format: ## Remarks Windows Presentation Foundation 色彩名稱符合.NET Framework 中，Windows Form 和[!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_ie](~/includes/tlasharptla-ie-md.md)]色彩名稱。The Windows Presentation Foundation color names match the .NET Framework, Windows Forms, and [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_ie](~/includes/tlasharptla-ie-md.md)] color names. 此表示法以 UNIX 為基礎 X11 具名色彩值。This representation is based on UNIX X11 named color values. 下圖顯示每個預先定義的色彩，其名稱，其十六進位值。The following image shows each predefined color, its name, and its hexadecimal value. ![預先定義的色彩](~/add/media/art-color-table.png "預先定義的色彩")![Predefined colors](~/add/media/art-color-table.png "Predefined colors") 色彩表包括色樣、 色彩的名稱和十六進位值Color Table including a color swatch, the color name, and the hexadecimal value 請參閱各種其他更複雜的方式，您可以色彩區域中，包括漸層的類別 (， ) 或映像 ()。See the class for a variety of other more complex ways you can color an area, including gradients (, ) or images (). ## XAML 文字使用方式XAML Text Usage 您無法宣告此受管理的類別中[!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_xaml](~/includes/tla2sharptla-xaml-md.md)]，但您可以使用指派的值中的靜態屬性[!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_xaml](~/includes/tla2sharptla-xaml-md.md)]。You cannot declare this managed class in [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_xaml](~/includes/tla2sharptla-xaml-md.md)], but you can use its static properties to assign values in [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_xaml](~/includes/tla2sharptla-xaml-md.md)].

MemberSignature.Value: Public Shared ReadOnly Property AliceBlue As Color
public: static property System::Windows::Media::Color AliceBlue { System::Windows::Media::Color get(); };

summary.span: 取得系統定義的色彩，其 [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_argb](~/includes/tlasharptla-argb-md.md)] 值為 #FFF0F8FF。

span.span: Gets the system-defined color that has an [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_argb](~/includes/tlasharptla-argb-md.md)] value of #FFF0F8FF.

value.span: 表示 Alpha、紅色、綠色及藍色色頻方面的色彩。

span.span: Represents colors in terms of alpha, red, green, and blue channels.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 如需有關色彩屬性的詳細資訊，請參閱。For more information about color properties, see . ## XAML Attribute UsageXAML Attribute Usage ```
